INFO.name: QUERY
INFO.value: SELECT TOP 100 source_id, ra, dec, phot_g_mean_mag, DISTANCE(POINT('ICRS', 83.8221, 22.0145), POINT('ICRS', ra, dec)) * 3600.0 AS angular_distance_arcsec FROM gaiadr3.gaia_source_lite WHERE 1 = CONTAINS(POINT('ICRS', ra, dec), CIRCLE('ICRS', 83.8221, 22.0145, 0.05)) AND phot_g_mean_mag > 12.0 AND phot_g_mean_mag IS NOT NULL ORDER BY angular_distance_arcsec ASC

RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT TOP 100 source_id, ra, dec, phot_g_mean_mag, DISTANCE(POINT('ICRS', 83.8221, 22.0145), POINT('ICRS', ra, dec)) * 3600.0 AS angular_distance_arcsec FROM gaiadr3.gaia_source_lite WHERE 1 = CONTAINS(POINT('ICRS', ra, dec), CIRCLE('ICRS', 83.8221, 22.0145, 0.05)) AND phot_g_mean_mag > 12.0 AND phot_g_mean_mag IS NOT NULL ORDER BY angular_distance_arcsec ASC

INFO.name: CAPTION
INFO.value: How to cite and acknowledge Gaia: https://gea.esac.esa.int/archive/documentation/credits.html

RESOURCE.INFO: How to cite and acknowledge Gaia: https://gea.esac.esa.int/archive/documentation/credits.html

FIELD.name: angular_distance_arcsec
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Angular distance from base coordinate in arcseconds
